attributes.review: I started out in this journey hopeful of getting more information on Mr. Trumpâ€™s agenda and plans for this countryâ€™s future. I had such high hopes for the all mighty one. But the app took almost 2 hours to load! Absolutely unacceptable. Thatâ€™s just the beginning, the first image I see when opening the app (finally) was Trumpâ€™s new logo! Appalling to see us revert back to Nazi Germanyâ€™s logo and propaganda. After taking a minute to collect myself I clicked away from the image and saw a video of a Trump rally. Not bad at first but later in the video, it showed Trump supporters! That alone is horrible but the Trump supporters proceeded to say horrible things about Bernie Sanders. They all simultaneously took out fishing poles to refer to Mr. Sanders as â€œfishy.â€ After about a day of having the app I started to get people coming up to my house and putting up Trump signs and trying to get me to join their cult. Iâ€™m not joking, they literally told me to join their cult for Donald Trump. Of course I said no, but then Michael Cohen himself came to my home and tried to persuade me to evade my taxes like he did. Both of these instances were 3 hours apart! And to wrap all of this up, the app broke my phone. My phone is currently on fire and I am writing this on my 20 year old flip phone. I would hope for compensation but if trump wonâ€™t even spend money on basic human rights, I doubt he will pay me for my phone. Besides that whole fiasco, I do NOT recommend this app. My heart goes out for the rest of these kind hearted individuals having a hard time with this app â¤ï¸
